command

Class CommandFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • command.CommandFactory

  • public class CommandFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    Factory class which creates commands. It is initialized with the main MainController and MainModel to easily create command which depend on these, from classes that are decoupled from them. Which is nice.
